attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: I have several complaints with this app which have caused me a massive headache. When I first entered the app, I saw a large orange figure with corn like hair who also happened to look like a turkey and it scared me. I did not know why this app, which was supposed to be educational, gave me such a jump scare. Like, I didnâ€™t notice Halloween came early?? This figure looked like a giant Oompa Loompa and I got reminded of all the nightmares I had from watching Charlie and the chocolate factory. And the fact that heâ€™s holding up his fist is making me FEAR for my life. This figure could literally show up at my doorstep and beat me up like the lady leaving a voicemail for Rachel the big, fat, white nasty, smelling a** bxtch, why you took me off the motherfxcking schedule with your trifling dirty white r*c*st a** big fat bxtch. Its making me fear for my life. Secondly, the reason why I got this app was to get informed and the first thing it asked for was my phone number?? Like hello!! Itâ€™s 2020 who uses phone numbers and texts? We all have social media so why bother asking for my phone? Anyways, this app is terrible and I have never encountered such a terrifying experience that genuinely made me fear for my life.
